name: Highlights
description: Top-level summary of key changes; helps readers quickly understand the release significance.
subtitle: for release summaries and key takeaways.

name: Breaking
description: Often placed first to avoid surprises and align with SemVer MAJOR bumps.
subtitle: for backward-incompatible changes that require consumer action.

name: Upgrade Guide
description: Migration steps and instructions for consumers to adapt to breaking changes.
subtitle: for migration instructions and upgrade paths.

name: Security
description: High-priority visibility; frequently audited and machine-consumed.
subtitle: for vulnerabilities, CVE fixes, and security-impacting changes.

name: Added
description: Canonical Keep a Changelog section; primary value creation signal.
subtitle: for new features or capabilities.

name: Changed
description: Includes behavior changes, API adjustments, and improvements.
subtitle: for modifications to existing functionality that are not breaking.

name: Deprecated
description: Forward-looking warning; important for long-term consumers.
subtitle: for features that will be removed in a future release.

name: Removed
description: Often follows a prior deprecation cycle.
subtitle: for features that have been fully removed.

name: Fixed
description: One of the most frequently scanned sections; signals correctness improvements.
subtitle: for bug fixes and correctness improvements.

name: Performance
description: Highlights latency, throughput, memory, or efficiency improvements.
subtitle: for non-functional performance improvements.

name: Dependencies
description: Covers added, upgraded, downgraded, or removed dependencies; important for supply-chain security and automation.
subtitle: for introduced, upgraded, downgraded, or removed dependencies.

name: Documentation
description: Updates to README, API docs, guides, and examples.
subtitle: for changes to documentation and user guidance.

name: Build
description: Changes to CI/CD, build system, compiler, or packaging processes.
subtitle: for build tooling and pipeline updates.

name: Tests
description: New or improved tests that increase coverage, reliability, or serve as usage examples.
subtitle: for test additions, improvements, and coverage changes.

name: Infrastructure
description: Changes to deployment, hosting, cloud, runtime, and platform.
subtitle: for infrastructure-related changes.

name: Observability
description: Logging, metrics, tracing, profiling, and monitoring changes.
subtitle: for improvements to observability and telemetry.

name: Compliance
description: Changes related to regulatory, legal, or policy requirements.
subtitle: for compliance-related updates.

name: Internal
description: Refactors or changes with no user-visible impact.
subtitle: for internal maintenance, refactoring, and technical debt work.

name: Known Issues
description: Documents known problems, limitations, or bugs in the release for transparency.
subtitle: for known problems and limitations in this release.

name: Contributors
description: Acknowledges individuals who contributed to the release; common in open source projects.
subtitle: for acknowledging contributors to this release.
